name: The Torch Bearer
description:
The Torch Bearer

Controls:

A&D: LEFT & RIGHT

W: JUMP

The Torch Bearer was made for Marlin's Olympic Game Jam (MOGjam) July 2021. Theme was The Olympics and the restriction was, No Balls.

You have 1 job. Get to the Olympic Games and light the Olympic Flame to signify the start of the games. 

All the music for this game was taken from my music asset packs: Browse the collection here.
